subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|Classical}} to [[cut]] [[apart]]
# to [[peel]]; to [[skin]]; to [[shell]]
# to [[fall]] off or to [[erode]]
# to [[strip]]; to [[deprive]]
